name: d3-sparql
description: Queries a SPARQL endpoint with a SELECT query and provides the data d3 “usable”

scripts.build: rimraf build && mkdirp build && rollup -g d3-request:d3 -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-sparql.js -- index.js
scripts.pretest: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-sparql.js -c -m -o build/d3-sparql.min.js
